reviews.name: Evans Plumbing and Drain Service, Inc.
reviews.text:
Russell Hammontree
3 reviews?5 photos
2 weeks agoNew
I posted a request for a local plumber for an RV Leak . Most residential businesses shy away from this because of the aggregation and difference between RV and residential .
5 minutes after my post I got a call from Evans Plumbing . I was told that they could help me out ? sometime ? after lunch
I realized that they were busy and already doing other scheduled projects . I was told they would be able to help me sometime after lunch . Well . Got a call at 5:30 pm  , Nick , with Evans Plumbing is at my driveway gate .  ?  What , ??  I used to own my own construction business , by 5:30pm I wanted to be at home with my family ( and beer ) .
He started the project and refused to stop and make a return visit the next day ! Extremely a professional attitude ! And much more patience with confined space and aggravating work situations than I have !
He took care of the problem and did an excellent job !!
I highly recommend EVANS PLUMBING !!!
Like

Rachel Leard
5 reviews

Super, super nice guys. When I called, the gentleman who answered the phone answered all of my (crazy) questions with uncomplicated answers, and was very helpful! Prompt response time and had the job done in less than an hour!

reviews.name: Wendy Wilson
reviews.text: 5 reviews 6 months ago I had a terrible leak in my home and it caused the plumber to have to cut holes in the ceiling and walls in order to locate the leak.  The water damaged my upstairs and downstairs flooring.  I called Jay's and not only did they jump right in to help, they completed this complex job in just a week.  They also worked with the Insurance company on my behalf for my claim.  They did a Great Job!!!!  My house looks great.  They even removed the popcorn texture in my Dining room and Kitchen and it looks awesome.  I recommend them to anyone that needs their help in water damage repair or any other repairs or improvements.  They also Really care for their customers.  Thanks to Jay's Home Improvement for making my home livable again! Like Simone Ali Simone Ali 2 years ago I desperately wanted a nice outdoor space to sit out and relax without all the that the south has to offer. And when I tell y?all they did an amazing job. I am sooo happy with their service. I?d hire them again in a heartbeat and recommend them to anyone looking to remodel or better their space. 10/10. The enclosed my space installed a light and fan and worked so proficiently. I mean just look at how beautiful it is!! Positive Responsiveness, Punctuality, Quality, Professionalism, Value

My wife and I oversaw the project. They were professional, timely, business oriented, receptive to our needs, and did an outstanding job! Jay was very prompt with his replies by email or text. I highly recommend them! 1 Response from the owner9 months ago Than you Janet Janet 1 review 10 months ago Jay did a wonderful job on my floors.  I had a flood in my entire home and he jumped in  and got my job done very quick and it looks beautiful!  Thank you, Jay for a job well done!  I really appreciate you! 1 Response from the owner9 months ago Thank you Miss Janet, and if you need anything else please don't hesitate to give us a call Gloria Foster Gloria Foster 1 review a year ago Jay's Home Improvement renovated my whole house. Walls, floors, completed a bathroom with walk-in tub, tile floors, toilet, cabinets, shelves, all electrical, plumbing, installed heaters, light fixtures, ceiling fans, hardware, ice maker, windows, waterline. They were even nice enough nice enough to install me window blinds. They're very respectful young men and traveled to Florence for Huntsville. Highly recommended

reviews.name: Heather
reviews.text: 5 reviews 9 months ago We have always been able to count on Marty Williams for our hvac needs - from repairing our old system, to installing our new system, and even coming out to our home after the ice storm when our downstairs furnace stopped working in frigid weather.  Marty got us on the schedule lightning fast for spring maintenance. Aaron came out today, thoroughly checked our systems, and answered all my questions. He was very kind. Marty is also a super nice guy and very honest. We're thankful we found Williams Air! Like J M J M 9 months ago Williams Air Conditioning & Refrigeration always does prompt and professional work at fair and reasonable prices.   Marty and his team have done work for me personally at my home and at my rental property. Highly recommend! Like Virginia Smith Virginia Smith Local Guide?401 reviews?113 photos 6 months ago Very professional. On time and delivered excellent service with an outstanding crew.  Cleaned up afterwards,  took precautions to keep my home clean, put up with the dogs and kids. Would recommend! Like Dan Luther Dan Luther 3 reviews 11 months ago Referred by our realtor to Marty and he really helped us out  - couldn't get our gas heat going in older home we purchased that had been sitting vacant for a while.  Saved me a service call by talking me through how to turn on gas at meter - honest guy, will definitely remember him for all future HVAC needs! Like Benjamin Winslett Benjamin Winslett 24 reviews a year ago We use them at my home and at church and they are always prompt, professional, and their prices are very reasonable. Services HVAC system maintenance, HVAC duct & vent repair, Repair HVAC

reviews.name: Mellisa Frison
reviews.text: Local Guide?117 reviews?5 photos a year ago Bought puppy wormer. They were educated on what I needed for my puppies. I did need some all in one shots as well, but they were out of stock at the time. I would Def. Recommend they keep things like this in stock and in date to continue good business. Great service. Reasonable prices. Like George Ingols George Ingols Local Guide?294 reviews 3 years ago Nice friendly couple running the store.  Fixed me up with the parts I needed to finish installing a car battery. While I'm the store I asked about deer corn prices.  They are over $10. cheaper for the six bags l need per feeder refill than what I paid in Montgomery, will help you load it and are open longer hours!  Definitely going back there. Like judy garrett judy garrett Local Guide?193 reviews?17 photos 4 years ago Young gentleman Gary courteous and helpful. Needed 2 bolts for car tag. There were none in stock. He mentioned he had one in his truck he would give me. Offered to pay him, he politely declined. Like Albert M. Albert M. 5 years ago I've been a regular customer since this hardware was first opened and I've always been very satisfied with the owners and their inventory. They have pretty much any and everything u need and if they don't they will try to find what u need and have it for you asap if must. I recommend their business to anyone I come into contact with who wants to know where to find any kind of hardware. Home town people with a home town business is what Highland Home Hardware is and that should be all that's needed to be told here! Doesn't take a genius to figure it out so go visit their store for your home and garden needs people! 2 David Hinds David Hinds 10 reviews 8 months ago They're doing better. They say they got a new owner and they restocking the store
